entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore stood up again and started speaking.

entities.name: ravenclaw table
entities.description: The object was moved to be clearly visible from the Ravenclaw table.

relationships.description: Dumbledore moved the object so that it would be clearly visible from the Ravenclaw table.
Once the golden plates had been wiped clean, Dumbledore stood up again.
